title: Peter Faith
author: Peter Faith
content: Every body wan make quick quick Cash .Gone are the days when youths work hard to earn a living,them no send how the money take come..nai make now scammers full everywhere...nobody is safe . Many people dey even before them make am but the hustle continues. I no really dey against working hard to make am, I no dey against fast hustle... wetin I dey against na quick money through illegal. comments.author: DubemIfedigbo001
comments.body: Quote from: Peter Faith on October 24, 2023, 07:02:33 PMGovernment too is to be blamed Sha cuz if you go all these government offices no workers yet they won't  employ fresh graduates .Na only God go help us Those office you go to without seeing staffs, there are people collecting salary monthly for those vacant positions. They are called ghost workers.  Most times they are relatives to the managers, their friends, friends of influential men who are too old to come to work or are not fit for official duty and so on. When salary comes, the managers have their percentage from the salaries paid to these ghost workers. The vacancy is only physical and not in the pay roll. The government is not to blame alone, although everything stems from their poor organization of the country,  corruption and favoritism is everywhere in the grassroot. Take for example in the civil service, those that retires replaced themselves with their relatives, thereby leaving no employment space for fresh graduates. Everybody contributes to this mess as its evident in our daily activities, but I still believe that the situation is redeemable, but the governing system needs a serious restructure.
